sentences.sContent: Mr. Norris said he was hopeful that his request would elicit a positive response.
sentences.sCn: 诺里斯先生说他希望他的要求会引起积极的回应。

remMethod.val: e(出) + lic(诱骗) + it → 诱骗到外面来 → 得出， 引出； 诱出

trans.tranCn: 得出, 引出, 抽出, 引起
trans.tranOther: If you elicit a response or a reaction, you do or say something that makes other people respond or react
